MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL18 postcode area of Rhyl affecting properties in Bryn Llys, Dyserth Road, Pen Y Llys and surrounding areas.  We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 9:01am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:13am on 3rd February 2021
